chapter.title: Globals
chapter.para:
Global constants in TDF-OS are very useful for development if you know what they are. Here are the global constants defined in the header files excluding those in MPX_SUPT.H:
BUFFER_SIZE - integer set to 256 in SHELL.H
FNAME_SIZE - integer set to 8 in SHELL.H
PARSER_FAIL_WHITESPACE - integer set to -200 in PARSER.H
PARSER_FAIL_LONGNAME - integer to to -201 in PARSER.H
PARSER_WIN_SINGLETON - integer set to 210 in PARSER.H
PARSER_WIN_HAS_ARGS - integer set to 211 in PARSER.H
READY - integer set to 0 in PCB.H
BLOCKED - integer set to 1 in PCB.H
READYSUSPENDED - integer set to 2 in PCB.H
BLOKCEDSUSPENDED - integer set to 3 in PCB.H
APPLICATION - integer set to 0 in PCB.H
SYSTEM - integer set to 1 in PCB.H
SHELL_EXIT_CONFIRM - integer set to 16 in SHELL.H
SHELL_EXIT_DENY - integer set to 32 in SHELL.H
HIST_LEN - integer set to 20 in HISTORY.H
VBS - integer set to 128 in VERSION.H
There is also a collection of global constants defined in MPX_SUPT.H, which was written by Dr. Mooney (not the TDF team). These may be viewed at src/include/MPX_SUPT.H.
